opening_theme: "Boku, Fuku-chan Dai! (ぼく, フクちゃんだい!)" by Chika Sakamoto
ending_theme: #1: "Fuku-chan Ekaki Uta (フクちゃんえかきうた)" by Chika Sakamoto
#2: "Ashita Tenki ni Naare (明日天気になあれ)" by Koorogi '73
#3: "Fuku-chan no Geta Ondo (フクちゃんのゲタ音頭)" by Chika Sakamoto, Young Fresh
#4: "Fuku-chan Taisou (フクちゃん体操)" by Columbia Yurikago Kai, Chika Sakamoto
#5: "Fuku-chan no Ouenka (フクちゃんの応援歌)" by Columbia Yurikago Kai, Chika Sakamoto, Youko Kuri, Reiko Katsura, Banjou Ginga
